info.description: Operation ticket management API for Hyper-Conn app

post.summary: A TAM consultant for any questions about events or operational issues.
post.description: A TAM consultant knows everything about events, operational issues or lifecycle notifications, including eventArn, actions needed for the event, event status, event action status, event start date, affected accounts, and etc. TAM consultant does not have any knowledge or information about tickets.

200.description: Answers to the question asked based on event knowledge base.

Text.description: Answers to the question asked based on event knowledge base.

get.summary: Get a list of all tickets for a given event ARN
get.description: Get a list of all tickets for a given event ARN

parameters.name: eventArn
parameters.description: eventArn of the event, the eventArn must be reformatted so that it contains only the substring of the original eventArn that comes after the 2 consecutive colon symbols. If there is no 2 consecutive colon symbols in the original eventArn, use the original format instead.

200.description: Get a list of all tickets for a given event ARN, start time, affected account id, or action status

PK.description: Unique ID of the ticket which is constructed by the event ARN and affected account id with '~' in between.

CommunicationId.description: The unique communication id about the event

StartTime.description: The impact start time of the event

LastUpdatedTime.description: The last time when event details were updated

EventDescription.description: The detailed description of the event

EvenActionStatus.description: The status of the actions taken against the event

TicketCreatedAt.description: The time when the ticket was created

TicketRejectedAt.description: The last time when the ticket was rejected
